error_details.explanation: Incorrect operand. The total number of teachers is 7, not 10.

context.question: N/A
context.flawed_solution:
#### 1
Her son has 3 teachers and her daughter has 4, so together they have 3+4 = <<3+4=7>>7 teachers
Harper has already spent $70 on 10 gifts, so she spent $70/10 = $<<70/10=7>>7 per gift
